SQL.LOAD_PROCESS_STATUS: select case when process_type_desc is not null then process_type_desc || ' (' || process_type_code || ')' else process_type_code end as process_type, status, comments, start_date_time, completion_date_time from ( select nvl(elita.getdescriptionfromcode('AFA_PROCESS_TYPE',s.process_type,:pi_language_id),s.process_type) as process_type_desc, s.process_type process_type_code, s.status, s.comments, s.start_date_time, s.completion_date_time, row_number() over(partition by s.process_type order by s.start_date_time desc) rnm from elita.elp_afa_status_tracking s where s.dealer_id = :pi_dealer_id and trunc(s.invoice_date) between trunc(:pi_billingdtstart) and trunc(:pi_billingdtend)) where rnm = 1 order by start_date_time desc
